title: Online Science Leadership Simulation: Engagement Maintenance Strategies Through Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental science theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: VR simulation-based problem-solving educational environment for science sector managers/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can independently solve 80% or more of real-world science-related problems in a VR-based simulation environment
Learners achieve 4.0/5.0 or higher in participation evaluations when collaborating in teams using the PBL approach
Learners can specify and implement three or more self-directed participation strategies in online learning environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
